敗る: (やぶる) - to tear/to break/to destroy; to break through (opponent's defense etc.)/to breach; to defeat/to beat; to shatter (dream, peace, etc.)/to disturb; to violate (a rule etc.)/to break (a promise etc.); to break (a record)
